TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 與 事件一起使用，當特定 的解析要求完成時這個事件就會收到通知。

span.span: Used in conjunction with the event, which is signaled when a resolve request for a specific has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 ResolveCompletedEventArgs 物件，具現化物件，並使用其中一種解決方法。To use the ResolveCompletedEventArgs object, instantiate a object and utilize one of the Resolve methods. 非同步處理，使用方法。For asynchronous processing, use the method. 當解析程式到達 cloud 查詢的結尾，它已達到最大數目的記錄項目或所建構，以完成解析程序事件引發時，以及相關聯的委派會導致 ResolveAsync 才能完成。When the Resolver has reached the end of the Cloud(s) to query for the , or it has reached the maximum number of record entries for the it is constructing, the event to complete the resolve process is raised, and the associated delegate causes ResolveAsync to complete. 也可能引發此事件，不會傳回集合的異常就完成。The event can also be raised for abnormal completions, which do not return a collection. 只有當已找到所有端點後，才會引發這個事件。This event is raised only once when all endpoints have been found. 解析程式物件的這個執行個體的所有參考都都與提供的語彙基元，是唯一的、 開發人員決定這個非同步解析要求的識別碼一致。All references to this instance of the Resolver object are coordinated with a supplied token, which is a unique, developer-determined identifier for this asynchronous resolve request.

MemberSignature.Value: public ResolveCompletedEventArgs (System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection peerNameRecordCollection, Exception error, bool canceled, object userToken);

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PeerNameRecordCollection As PeerNameRecordCollection

summary.span: 取得要解析的 物件。

value.span: 要解析的 物件是在特定 上找到的物件，以回應 作業。

span.span: The object to resolve is the one found in response to a operation on a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當所有雲端已都查詢的這個對等名稱，或在擷取的對等名稱的記錄數目上限時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when all clouds have been queried for this peer name, or when the maximum number of peer name records has been retrieved. 會引發此事件將放入對等的名稱記錄集合到OnResolveCompleted 方法等候事件引數。It is raised by putting the peer name record collection into the event argument for which the OnResolveCompleted method is waiting. 狀態變更會喚醒程序。The change in state awakens the process. 除非明確指定，否則參考型別 (Reference Type) 的所有屬性預設值為 `null`，型別為 `int` 的屬性則為零 (0)。Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type `int`. 如果找不到任何記錄，`null`傳回。If no records were found, `null` is returned.
